questions.question: What is the dominant color scheme of the nutrition facts panel, predominantly observed in the background?

What is the descriptive term used to represent the quantitative measure of fat that is saturated?

What is the type of fat explicitly mentioned among the listed nutritional components?

What is the unit of measurement for the percentage daily values (%DV) shown next to each nutrient?

What is the general term for the substances that provide the body with energy?
